Data Generator¶

DataGenerator.py

This script contains the implmentation of class ImageGenerator which is used as a data generator in the project nirschl_et_al

created by Jalil Ahmed.

class src.DataGenerator.ImageGenerator(x, y, batch_size, num_patches, patch_size=64, num_classes=2, augmentation=False)¶

This class is a child class of the tensorflow.keras.Sequence class. It is used as a data generator in the project. The __getitem__() method of the class is especially written with the procd sject in mind.

Nirschl et al Implementation
